summary: Bows deal x15 damage instead of Vanilla x2. Higher/Lower Values available on request.
descriptionHtml:
Bows deals x15 damage instead of Vanilla x2. 

Load order: For me I have it at bottom. Below (Higher number) ALL combat mods to make sure.

Made for personal use but if anyone has any interest drop me a comment and I'll put up any value you want.

Why so high? I used to use Zalzama's but it seemed to get outdated and not work. I then used the deadly aim perk mod (Changes it to x9 then x15) but the I discovered SkyRe and couldn\'t mess about with the perks. With SkyRe I'm level 4 and regularly see level 12-14+. The mod is primarily meant for solo sneaking in early levels of Skyrim Redone or other increased difficulty mods. So here we are.

Recomended (Archery) Mods: Proper Aiming
author: Jazz162
